parameters.param:
rd /q /s "%%userprofile%%\AppData\Local\1C\1Cv8\" rd /q /s "%%userprofile%%\AppData\Roaming\1C\1Cv8\"
call ring edt@%env.EDT_VERSION% workspace export --project %system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\%env.ExtName% --configuration-files %system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\xml --workspace-location %system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\WP

echo "##teamcity[testStarted name='Load extention' captureStandardOutput='true']" start /wait "1cv8.exe" %env.PathTo1CPlatform% DESIGNER /F%system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\TempDB /N %env.LoginTo1C% /P %env.PassTo1C% /Out %env.LogFile1C% /LoadConfigFromFiles %system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\xml -Extension %env.ExtName% sh -c "while read line; do if [[ $line == *"Error"* ]]; then echo -e ""\e[31m $line""; else echo -e ""\e[34m $line""; fi; done < ""%env.LogFile1C%"";" echo "##teamcity[testFinished name='Load extention']"
echo "##teamcity[testStarted name='Update extention' captureStandardOutput='true']" start /wait "1cv8.exe" %env.PathTo1CPlatform% DESIGNER /F%system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\TempDB /N %env.LoginTo1C% /P %env.PassTo1C% /Out %env.LogFile1C% /UpdateDBCfg -Extension %env.ExtName% sh -c "while read line; do if [[ $line == *"Error"* ]]; then echo -e ""\e[31m $line""; else echo -e ""\e[34m $line""; fi; done < ""%env.LogFile1C%"";" echo "##teamcity[testFinished name='Update extention']"

echo "##teamcity[testStarted name='Check extention modules' captureStandardOutput='true']" start /wait "1cv8.exe" %env.PathTo1CPlatform% DESIGNER /F%system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\TempDB /N %env.LoginTo1C% /P %env.PassTo1C% /Out %env.LogFile1C% /CheckModules -ThinClient -Server -ExtendedModulesCheck -Extension %teamcity.build.id% sh -c "while read line; do if [[ $line == *"Error"* ]]; then echo -e ""\e[31m $line""; else echo -e ""\e[34m $line""; fi; done < ""%env.LogFile1C%"";" echo "##teamcity[testFinished name='Check extention modules']"

echo "##teamcity[testStarted name='Check config modules' captureStandardOutput='true']" start /wait "1cv8.exe" %env.PathTo1CPlatform% DESIGNER /F%system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\TempDB /N %env.LoginTo1C% /P %env.PassTo1C% /Out %env.LogFile1C% /CheckConfig -ConfigLogIntegrity -IncorrectReferences -ThinClient -Server -UnreferenceProcedures -HandlersExistence -EmptyHandlers -ExtendedModulesCheck -CheckUseModality -Extension %teamcity.build.id% sh -c "while read line; do if [[ $line == *"Error"* ]]; then echo -e ""\e[31m $line""; else echo -e ""\e[34m $line""; fi; done < ""%env.LogFile1C%"";" echo "##teamcity[testFinished name='Check config modules']"

echo "##teamcity[testStarted name='Upload extention to cfe' captureStandardOutput='true']" start /wait "1cv8.exe" %env.PathTo1CPlatform% DESIGNER /F%system.teamcity.build.workingDir%\TempDB /N %env.LoginTo1C% /P %env.PassTo1C% /Out %env.LogFile1C% /DumpCfg %teamcity.build.workingDir%\%teamcity.build.id%.cfe -Extension %teamcity.build.id%
sh -c "while read line; do if [[ $line == *"Error"* ]]; then echo -e ""\e[31m $line""; else echo -e ""\e[34m $line""; fi; done < ""%env.LogFile1C%"";" echo "##teamcity[publishArtifacts '%teamcity.build.workingDir%\%teamcity.project.id%.cfe']" echo "##teamcity[testFinished name='Upload extention to cfe']"
